Muslim bahula kisima nagareka marga neethi pilipadin na. Muslim kellek sinhala kollek ekka yalu wunoth agama wenas karanna kollata bala karanawa. Anthawadi muslim sanwidhanawala aya budurajanan wahanseta pawa apahasa karanawa. Lankawe muslimslata ladaru molayakhari thiyenawanam alla deviyantath wada garu karanna ona budurajanan wahanseta. Mokada anunge ratakata weladame awith genu, idam, wyaparika sthana, deshapalana balaya, aseemitha agamika nidahasa wage hema deyakma lebune meka baudda ratak wuna nisamai. Ehew sinhalaya pagala marala me rata islam ratak karanna heena dakina hema kenekma balla kiyana sathatath wadiya pahath kenek. Mokada balla kawadawath kalaguna amathaka karan na.
